subject: Re: [junit] Randomly Ordered Repeating Test Suite
msgSnippet: ... I ve never seen anything for this. You would need to write it. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416
messageBody:
David Corbin wrote:

> Is there a addon available that will take a set of tests, and run them
> repeatedly in a random orders until failure (or forcibly stopped).

I've never seen anything for this. You would need to write it.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
